summary: The 'Sovereign States Bureau of Prisons Restructuring Act of 2025' directs the Attorney General to restructure the funding of the Bureau of Prisons as state block grants. The bill mandates the Attorney General to develop a plan within 270 days to return funding to 2019 levels. It stipulates that 50% of the funds will be directed to states as block grants, with 10% each allocated for the administering office within the Department of Justice and the Office of Inspector General's oversight.
